column4: next question from ian : "why do I have those .xxx directories and files in my windows home folder?" :D
- yeah - that is kinda y i thunk this mightn't be the wisest course of action - i'd hate to see ian delete some of these obscure files!
- i recall one day, several years ago, deleting this terribly bloated pagefile.swp in an early NT3.5 machine.... one sheepish phone call to our sys admin set me straight :)
